website_summaries.verdict: This helmet is comfortable and streamlined, but most importantly it's safe. The dual layer liner absorbs impact better than the competitors.
pros: Thanks to two upper air intake vents, you can keep cool and comfortable on any ride
Plus, a fog resistant lens insert is included
cons: Expensive, but you are paying for safety and peace of mind

customer_reviews.title: it was comfortable, light
customer_reviews.text: While I had it, it was comfortable, light, and still had good airflow. Even for an entry-level shoei, it was noticeable a class above my icon armada. The only issue is that there is a gap in the seal between my head and liner in the back that causes wind noise. Didn't get around to fixing it cause a little after I bought it I went down. Pretty serious accident with front end damage on my bike and injuries to me but no head damage or injuries and never lost consciousness. So A+ on saving my life.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Greere

customer_reviews.title: Solid Good Helmet - Great Bang for Your Buck, Too!
customer_reviews.text: In my near-40 years of daily riding on the mean streets of Los Angeles, I've owned many helmets--though mostly those from Arai, first, and Shoei second. But this is my first "budget" helmet, and I am impressed. As comfortable as any other Shoe I've owned, but for less the money. I would give this helmet five stars if they used the same strap buckle that they use on their modular helmets. This archaic D-ring is and always has been a bit of a pain--and forget trying to secure the strap with gloves on. A quick release ratchet device should be incorporated. And Arai needs to know, too.
customer_reviews.author: Tinwoods

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet and very nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitting and quiet helmet. The head shape is very similar to my Bell RS-1. It's less narrow and more forgiving of a head shape than other Shoei helmets. No other Shoei I've tried has fit me. I'm very pleased. The liner isn't my favorite material. It's seems to hold sweat instead of wicking it away. However, overall it's great. Cardo Scala intercom fit very well. The speaker pockets are just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Mullinax

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, sent wrong color
customer_reviews.text: Product photo is misleading. I was not sent the flat black helmet that I ordered I was sent a shiny black helmet instead. Fits as expected, so rather than send the back I’m just going to keep it. Otherwise great product, air vents allowed great flow of fresh air into helmet on hot days. Three stars for wrong color five stars for great product!
customer_reviews.author: H20Sun&Fun

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and safe
customer_reviews.text: I feel comfortable wearing this helmet knowing of the high quality that Shoei puts out. Not much difference between this and the RF 1200 (from what I have read, as far as safety features go) so why not save a few bucks? Love it. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Barba

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for dual-sport riders!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this helmet for my wife to start learning to ride. This is a great helmet. They are comfortable and have the highly desirable SNELL safety rating. In fact, I believe this is the most affordable SNELL rated helmet. Good venting, quiet, light, and nice colors too. No, there’s no Bluetooth communicator built-in but you can add that easily at a later date (I did). Good peripheral vision and perfect for riding a dual-sport/adventure bike. We like ours.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Long

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety ratings, fit and bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic helmet with great safety ratings for a very reasonable price. I gave it 4 stars for weight only because you could spend twice as much and get a lighter helmet but in this price range it’s great. 4 shell sizes also means my daughter doesn’t have a huge bucket on her head that has extra large pads installed to make it fit her. The color/finish is fantastic as well. I will definitely buy her another when she out grows this one.
customer_reviews.author: K.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great breathability
customer_reviews.text: My first Shoei and absolutely love it bought it open box so got a nice discount good air ventilation for the base model of Shoei helmets. Very quiet when riding and paired it with the tinted windscreen wouldn’t go back to any other helmet!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Lalk

customer_reviews.title: Just an awesome helmet
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, great looking and very comfortable to put on and off. I went through a few helmets that were cheaper and this is definitely worth the money!. Also, invest in the photochromatic shield.
customer_reviews.author: Ari312

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sizing chart..
customer_reviews.text: Like this helmet. The sizing chart was spot on. It stays put snugly. Still need earplugs but no helmet is sound proof. It came with chin wind guard and winter anticondensation attach for visor. I did not have $900 to spend on other models. I am satisfied with my purchase. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: TMC Enterprises, Inc (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: Great helmet, inadequate packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet. I had it before years ago and just bought the newest version. I’m giving it three stars here to hopefully draw Shoei / Amazon’s attention. For this much money, and for a helmet that’s effectiveness requires it not being dropped, the packaging was terrible. The top of the box was untapped and opened when I grabbed it by the built in handles. Scares me to think about it’s journey from warehouse to here.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter J.W. Joslin

customer_reviews.title: Great vision, super comfortable, very quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Best helmet I ever had! Migrated from an open face for safety reasons, only problem is that it doesn't give me the same airy feeling because is so quiet when closed. Fair trade off! The color is absolutely perfect, not too dark or light. Easy to clean because is not matte.
customer_reviews.author: F.C.

customer_reviews.title: Great CRUISER helmet
customer_reviews.text: For me it felt like it pushes up on your cheeks just a bit but it fits snug while also comfortable. Plenty of room for SENA speaker install. Vents work best if in upright riding position.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Stepherson

customer_reviews.title: M2015 rating sticker
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet. Someone asked if about the rating. This is a sticker inside the helmet under the padding. Padding removed easily for washing. Excellent helmet, great value for the money compared to many others.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Well made helmet
customer_reviews.text: It's a great helmet, basic but we'll made, very quiet compared to other helmets, visor shuts Tite,
customer_reviews.author: Omgomg

customer_reviews.title: SHOEI QUALITY AT A BARGAIN PRICE
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Shoei full-face lids for more than 20 years, and always went with the RF-1100 / RF-1200 models. I had to retire an old one recently, and decided to try the RF-SR at an attractive price point. Helmet arrived quickly, fits well, and is comfortable in the bike. The pin-lock visor was included, an extra bonus.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Helmet
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and your noggin is the most important part of your body when you ride. This is incredibly comfortable, quiet, and most importantly safe. I tried on the 1200 and I still prefer the SR.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Beat helmet that i've used.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great helmet. I really love it and it looks so clean. The visors are great. Only gripe is that it doesn't come with a hook strap and the defaults straps are a pain to use.
customer_reviews.author: sunil kumar

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit and build quality. What can you say about an excellent brand. I wish they were cheaper, but you get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Will def get again comfortable/cool looking helmet, added smoked shield to it looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: 07YAMAHAR6

customer_reviews.title: Wind noise
customer_reviews.text: Quietness is overrated, in my opinion. Just as loud as my HJC rpha-11
customer_reviews.author: Eric Crider

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with purchase and I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best “bang for the buck” helmet I’ve ever had! There is a bit of wind noise but hopefully with the addition of a chin curtain that will be controlled. Very comfortable and the ventilation system is wonderful and here in Florida the heat can make a dark colored helmet like torture but not the case with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Lee

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: It's not the fanciest Shoei helmet but still Shoei quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Eff

customer_reviews.title: Quality helmet and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Has minimal wind noise and good ventilation. Shield has positive adjustments. Only downside is you'll need to wear sunglasses with the stock shield since it offers no tint.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this helmet, been using it for almost 6 months. Plan on getting one in a different color other than white!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: I found the 2XL to be a perfect fit. I am well pleased with the fit
customer_reviews.text: Quick and no problems with size exchange. I wear a XL in a Harley Davidson half helmet but that was too small in this Shoei model. I found the 2XL to be a perfect fit. I am well pleased with the fit, quality and comfort of this helmet. If you can spring for the Transitions tint changing face shield do it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't understand why they are expensive as a beginner biker but now it makes sense.
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very nice, they don't feel cheap at all. Also, I felt that it's very aerodynamic. I think it totally worth the money and I wonder how good other expensive models are.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Yen Pham

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Helmet
customer_reviews.text: High Quality helmet. Light to wear. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar A. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight and no fog!
customer_reviews.text: Great helmet! Fits very nicely, does a great job at reducing fog, great ventilation and snell approved. Outstanding helmet for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Louis Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Ok helmet. It's definitely a budget RF-1200. Fit is nice and comfortable. Venting sucks. Visor is okay, wish it had a better vent position. The pinlock is awesome. I probably wouldn't buy this helmet again given the chance. If you're on a semi-strict budget and want a Snell helmet this will work but there are other options.
customer_reviews.author: BobD

customer_reviews.title: Solid Value
customer_reviews.text: Upper-end helmet that was less than $400 out door. Best for a bike where rider is more upright (i.e., not a sport bike).
customer_reviews.author: Tye

customer_reviews.title: not worth 399.00 plus tax
customer_reviews.text: chin strap it's no good short and hard to put on. it's just a name. lining inside is rough. visor especially the extra for no fog not good if you wear sunglasses or glasses.
customer_reviews.author: RASAC

customer_reviews.title: Nice helmet
customer_reviews.text: The helmet arrived with the decal peeling off but other than that the helmet is great! Fits comfortably and I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D Day

customer_reviews.title: Best Helmet
customer_reviews.text: Superior helmet that fits great. Superior value for a Snell and DOT approved helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Helmet does not vent well. But the product is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stafone

customer_reviews.title: ... the Rf1200 but with a venting system that works best with best with an upright position (sport touring
customer_reviews.text: This new Shoei model is comparable to the Rf1200 but with a venting system that works best with best with an upright position (sport touring, touring). I'm very pleased with this helmet. It has the typical quality one can expect from Shoei. It's comfortable and quiet.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice helmet but had horrible refraction in the windshield. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: EverythingIsAwesome

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mostly I liked the Shoie brand but I returned it because I found a better price.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: Shoei RF-SR Helmet - Solid (Large) (Black)
product_meta.description: Size:Large| Color:BLACKFour shell and EPS liner sizes present increased fit options that help to comfortably fit most head sizes. Ventilation System: Two upper air intake vents are positioned to maximize air volume into the helmet interior; hot air is exhausted through top outlet for a more comfortable ride. Lower intake vent absorbs air exhaled from the mouth to help eliminate shield fogging. Breath guard and chin curtain included. Lightweight, Advanced Integrated Matrix Plus (AIM+): High performance fiber materials are combined with extremely elastic organic fibers into shell construction for a structure that is ultra lightweight, rigid, and resilient. 3D Custom Interior System: The entire interior lining (cheek pads, upper liner, and chin strap covers) can be removed for cleaning, center and cheek pads can be replaced with optional thicknesses for a customizable fit. E.Q.R.S. (Emergency Quick Release System) allows emergency medical personnel to easily remove the cheek pads from an injured rider’s helmet, enabling the helmet to be more easily removed from the head. Extra comfort provided by removable ear pads, breath guard, and chin curtain. Standard Chin-Strap: Neatly secures chin strap. CWR-1 Shield and QR-E System: CWR-1 shield features ribs along the top and bottom to improve rigidity and eliminate bending from wind pressure during opening and closing. Improved window beading features dual-layered dual lip construction that ensures a windproof and waterproof seal with every closure. Locking mechanism easily engages the shield lock when fully closed. Pinlock® pins and EVO fog-resistant lens insert included. Spring-loaded base plates offer quick shield changes. Five-stage rotating dial allows fine tuning of the base plate for easy shield adjustments. QR-E closure system allows for tool-less shield removal and installation, and provides an air-tight seal intended to significantly minimize wind noise. Five-Year Warranty: Five-Year warranty from purchase date. Seve
feature_bullets: The name SHOEI has long been synonymous with "premium" in the motorcycle helmet market - a credential that hundreds of loyal men and women in their Japan factories wear with great pride.

The evolution and production of their world-class helmet line is a meticulous process that combines the very latest in technology with consumer feedback, modern testing practices, advanced materials, and over 50 years of helmet building experience.

Just like the very first SHOEI helmet built by their founder back in 1959, every SHOEI today is still handmade in Japan utilizing a sophisticated process that involves over 50 people for each and every helmet.
Aerodynamic Shell Design: Aerodynamic properties are maximized through extensive wind tunnel testing and professional riders' feedback.
Dual-layer multi-density EPS liner enhances impact absorption and ventilation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars93 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
